ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"يَوْمَ","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":73004,"word_number_in_surah":211,"word_translation":"(The) Day","word_transliteration":"yawma"},{"word_arabic":"يُكْشَفُ","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":73005,"word_number_in_surah":212,"word_translation":"will be uncovered","word_transliteration":"yuk'shafu"},{"word_arabic":"عَن","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":73006,"word_number_in_surah":213,"word_translation":"from","word_transliteration":"an"},{"word_arabic":"سَاقٍ","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":73007,"word_number_in_surah":214,"word_translation":"the shin","word_transliteration":"saqin"},{"word_arabic":"وَيُدْعَوْنَ","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":73008,"word_number_in_surah":215,"word_translation":"and they will be called","word_transliteration":"wayud'awna"},{"word_arabic":"إِلَى","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":73009,"word_number_in_surah":216,"word_translation":"to","word_transliteration":"ila"},{"word_arabic":"السُّجُودِ","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":73010,"word_number_in_surah":217,"word_translation":"prostrate","word_transliteration":"al-sujudi"},{"word_arabic":"فَلَا","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":73011,"word_number_in_surah":218,"word_translation":"but not","word_transliteration":"fala"},{"word_arabic":"يَسْتَطِيعُونَ","word_ayah":42,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":73012,"word_number_in_surah":219,"word_translation":"they will be able","word_transliteration":"yastati'una"}]
